story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: JWHERBAL BY JWGROUP was founded with the intention to provide high-quality herbal products to Thai consumers. We believe that Thai herbs have excellent value and effectiveness in healthcare.
story.paragraph2: With over 10 years of experience in the herbal industry, we have built trust from over 50,000 customers through offering quality products that meet FDA standards and are certified by international organizations.
story.paragraph3: All our products go through careful selection of raw materials from trusted sources, developed in collaboration with researchers and herbal experts to ensure the highest quality and safety.
